import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Button, Form, FormGroup, Label, Input } from "reactstrap"; import { Container, Row, Col } from "reactstrap"; import { Formik } from "formik"; import * as Yup from 'yup'; const SignupSchema = Yup.object().shape({ name: Yup.string().required .min(2, 'Too Short!') .max(50, 'Too Long!') .required('Required'), surname: Yup.string() .min(2, 'Too Short!') .max(50, 'Too Long!') .required('Required'), email: Yup.string() .email('Invalid email') .required('Required'), }); export class Reactstrap extends Component { render() { return (
